mapper.insert: insert into t_clientinfo (mobile, password, status, createTime) values (#{mobile}, #{password}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select * from t_clientinfo where status = 0 and mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.update: update t_clientinfo set password = #{password} where mobile = #{mobile} and status = 0
mapper.select: select * from t_clientinfo where clientId = #{clientId} and status = 0
mapper.update: update t_clientinfo set name = #{name} where clientId = #{clientId}
